H0.text: Which European country has the world’s oldest national flag. Sweden

H1.text: Which European country has the world’s oldest national flag. United Kingdom

H2.text: Which European country has the world’s oldest national flag. Netherlands

H3.text: Which European country has the world’s oldest national flag. Danska

A4.text: The flag holds the Guinness world record of being the oldest continuously used national flag, that is since 1625.

A5.text: The flag became popular as a national flag in the early 16th century.
